attributes.action: Remove half tarrif sentencing and allow judges to determine the length of sentence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If someone is sentenced to 10 years that's what they will serve, not 5.  Life should mean life without parole and you will die in prison.

Government should determine maximum sentences and judges should use their professional judgement to sentence criminals according those guidelines.

Parole should also be determined by the judge at the time of sentencing and 'no parole' should mean exactly that.
